data.title: Triazine
data.meta_description: Triazines are a class of nitrogen-containing heterocycles. The parent molecules' molecular formula is C3H3N3. They exist in three isomeric forms, 1,3,5-triazines being common.
data.text:
Aromatic, heterocyclic compound / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
